revision.text: Possibly: A letter to the Rev. Mr --- concerning the uses of the Greek article in the New Testament; London, June 10, 1778, by Granville Sharp. http://quod.lib.umich.edu/e/ecco/004891918.0001.000/1:5?rgn=div1;view=fulltext. Reprinted in: Remarks on the uses of the definitive article the Greek text of the new Testament..., by Granville Sharp. 3rd ed. (London: Vernor & Hood, 1803). p.1 ff. Full text at: https://archive.org/details/remarksonusesofd00sharrich. See also: http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2384717~S1
